additionalProperty.name: Customizable Reports
additionalProperty.value: Customizable reports in telematics allow users to tailor data analysis to their specific needs, offering insights beyond standard reports. These reports can be created based on various criteria like vehicle, trip, or driver and can include detailed information on fuel usage, driving behavior and more. This flexibility enables businesses to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs), track trends and make data-driven decisions for improved efficiency and safety.

additionalProperty.name: Publicly Accessible API Documentation
additionalProperty.value: Benefits of using a telematics API: improve safety and productivity, while reducing life-cycle costs; optimise business operations and improve efficiency; track and monitor all your assets from one location; modern maintenance (with telematics API data provided) helps to reduce equipment failures; eliminate guesswork - accurate data enables you to make reliable decisions and calculate life-cycle costs.

additionalProperty.name: Satellite
additionalProperty.value: Although often used interchangeably, Satellite and GPS tracking refer to different concepts. GPS is a specific satellite-based navigation system operated by the US, consisting of 24 satellites. Satelite is a broader term that includes various satellite networks used for positioning, communication and data transmission, such as Globalstar, Iridium and Inmarsat

additionalProperty.name: Document Management
additionalProperty.value: Drivers can use smartphone or tablet to capture delivery photos, record notes, collect electronic signatures and more. Access to these records allows for quick investigation of claims related to overages, shortages, damages, or missed delivery windows. Documents and notes are available anytime, enabling faster processes for tasks like customer invoicing, payroll and operational reviews.

additionalProperty.name: Invoice Management
additionalProperty.value: Functionalities for generating customer invoices, managing billing and automating complex billing processes. These features aim to streamline administrative tasks, improve efficiency and ensure accurate billing for fleet-related services.

additionalProperty.name: Fuel usage reporting
additionalProperty.value: Telematics systems offer advanced fuel usage reporting features that provide detailed insights into fuel consumption, enabling fleet managers to optimize fuel efficiency and reduce costs. These features include comprehensive fuel consumption reports, real-time alerts for potential issues like fuel theft or wastage and tools for monitoring driving behavior that impacts fuel economy.

additionalProperty.name: Trip KPI dashboard
additionalProperty.value: A Trip KPI (Key Performance Indicator) dashboard, integrated with telematics, provides a comprehensive overview of vehicle trip data, enabling fleet managers to track and analyze key performance indicators for efficient fleet management. This dashboard offers insights into various aspects of each trip, such as fuel consumption, distance traveled, driving time, idling time and more, allowing for data-driven decision-making.

additionalProperty.name: GPS Tracking
additionalProperty.value: Telematics incorporates GPS tracking as a core component, enabling the monitoring of vehicle location and movement. Telematics systems use GPS data, along with other information from the vehicle's on-board diagnostics, to provide a comprehensive view of vehicle performance and driver behavior. This data is transmitted to a central system where it can be analyzed and used for fleet management, improving efficiency and enhancing safety.

additionalProperty.name: Android (Management)
additionalProperty.value: Telematics management on Android involves using mobile applications to monitor, analyze and manage vehicle data collected by telematics devices. These tools allow for real-time tracking, driver behavior analysis, route optimization and more, enhancing fleet management and overall vehicle operations.

additionalProperty.name: iOS (Management)
additionalProperty.value: Managing telematics on iOS means using apps  to track, analyze and manage vehicle data from telematics devices. These tools give you real-time tracking, insights into driver behavior, route optimization and more - making fleet management and vehicle operations a whole lot smoother.
